description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is an anonymous piece-by-piece reply to another comment about the reporter who was suspended from ExTwitter hours after publishing an article about it: “In other words, he either bot boosted an article about botting, or else the botting services are giving him a freebie.” You […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
